title: COP26: What is Methane Gas and Why Does Biden Want to Reduce Emissions?
sub_head: The clear and odorless gas produced in part by burning fossil fuels is a major contributor to global warming, scientists say
body:
WASHINGTON—Amid the COP26 climate summit in Glasgow, the Biden administration has proposed tougher new rules to regulate methane emissions in oil- and natural-gas production. Here’s what you need to know about methane emissions and why they have come under a spotlight.
Methane is the main ingredient of natural gas, a fossil fuel burned to heat homes and fuel power plants.
